page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Seven children from Lightcliffe school did some work on boys and girls games in the playground.These are games we all play without any proper organisation.These are some of them Kick the Can Range Rovers BBC Whistle Top Mad Rugby Jump Fights Ben The Lion Black pudding Leap Frog Several kinds of Tig Hide and seek. {THIS IS HOW TO PLAY KICK THE CAN First choose someone to be on.He must get the can, which has been kicked, and count to a hundred.If you are seen you have to wait at the can,until some one else Kicks it. {SKIPPING RHYMES }are popular with girls, especially Bumper Cars, Blue Bells, I'm a little Girl Guide and Sally in the Kitchen.
